generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and tram tracks, which is clearly designated for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: A concrete sidewalk is visible on the right side of the road, elevated slightly above the road surface and separated by a curb.
- building: Multiple buildings are visible along both sides of the street, including residential and commercial structures.
- wall: A concrete wall runs along the right side of the sidewalk, separating it from the adjacent building.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including traffic light poles and utility poles along the street.
- traffic light: A red traffic light is visible at an intersection ahead on the right side of the road.
- traffic sign: A blue and white "U" sign indicating a U-Bahn (subway) station is visible on the right side of the road.
- vegetation: Trees and greenery are visible in the background and along the sides of the street.
- sky: The sky is visible at the top of the image, appearing clear and blue.
- car: Several cars are visible on the road, including a white sedan directly in front of the viewpoint.
- bus: A yellow and blue tram (a type of rail bus) is prominently visible on the left side of the road.
- train: The tram on the left side of the road is a type of train operating on rails.
- motorcycle: No motorcycles are visible in the image.
- bicycle: No bicycles are visible in the image.
- person: No people are clearly visible in the image.
- rider: No riders are visible in the image.
- terrain: No terrain (grass, soil, sand) is visible in the image.
- truck: No trucks are visible in the image.
